types.html:
marin-pompier m (plural marins-pompiers)

  1. (France, military) a member of a French marine corps principally concerned with firefighting and search and rescue missions
    Coordinate term: sapeur-pompier
    • 2024 July 10, “En période estivale, le rappel essentiel des bonnes pratiques”, in La Provence, page 10:
      En ce premier grand week-end de chassé-croisé des vacances d'été, les marins-pompiers de Marseille appellent à la plus grande vigilance et rappellent les précautions essentielles en cette période.
      (please add an English translation of this quotation)
trans: a member of a French marine corps principally concerned with firefighting and search and rescue missions
a member of a French marine corps principally concerned with firefighting and search and rescue missions
